AddIpamMembers.title: AddIpamMembers
AddIpamMembers.summary: Adds members to an IP Address Manager (IPAM).

AddIpamPoolCidr.title: AddIpamPoolCidr
AddIpamPoolCidr.summary: Provisions a CIDR block for an IPAM pool.

AssociateIpamResourceDiscovery.title: AssociateIpamResourceDiscovery
AssociateIpamResourceDiscovery.summary: Associates a resource discovery with an IPAM instance.

ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup
ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Changes the resource group of an IPAM resource.

CreateIpamPoolAllocation.title: CreateIpamPoolAllocation
CreateIpamPoolAllocation.summary: Creates a custom reserved CIDR block from an IPAM pool.

CreateIpamResourceDiscovery.title: CreateIpamResourceDiscovery
CreateIpamResourceDiscovery.summary: Creates a resource discovery instance of a custom type.

CreateIpamScope.title: CreateIpamScope
CreateIpamScope.summary: Creates scopes for IPAM to manage private and public IP addresses.

DeleteIpamPoolAllocation.title: DeleteIpamPoolAllocation
DeleteIpamPoolAllocation.summary: Releases a CIDR allocation from an IP Address Management (IPAM) address pool. Supported allocation types include virtual private cloud (VPC) and custom allocation.

DeleteIpamPoolCidr.title: DeleteIpamPoolCidr
DeleteIpamPoolCidr.summary: Deletes a provisioned CIDR block from an IP Address Manager (IPAM) pool.

DissociateIpamResourceDiscovery.title: DissociateIpamResourceDiscovery
DissociateIpamResourceDiscovery.summary: Disassociates a resource discovery from an IP Address Manager (IPAM) instance.

GetIpamPoolAllocation.title: GetIpamPoolAllocation
GetIpamPoolAllocation.summary: Queries the details of a CIDR block allocation in a specified IPAM pool.

GetIpamPoolNextAvailableCidr.title: GetIpamPoolNextAvailableCidr
GetIpamPoolNextAvailableCidr.summary: Retrieves an available CIDR block from an IPAM pool.

GetVpcIpamServiceStatus.title: GetVpcIpamServiceStatus
GetVpcIpamServiceStatus.summary: Retrieves the status of the IPAM service.

ListIpamMembers.title: ListIpamMembers
ListIpamMembers.summary: Lists the members managed by the IPAM trusted service.

ListIpamPoolAllocations.title: ListIpamPoolAllocations
ListIpamPoolAllocations.summary: Queries information about CIDR block allocations in an IPAM pool.

ListIpamPoolCidrs.title: ListIpamPoolCidrs
ListIpamPoolCidrs.summary: Queries the provisioned CIDR blocks of an IPAM pool.

ListIpamResourceCidrs.title: ListIpamResourceCidrs
ListIpamResourceCidrs.summary: Lists the CIDR blocks of resources in an IPAM scope.

ListIpamResourceDiscoveries.title: ListIpamResourceDiscoveries
ListIpamResourceDiscoveries.summary: Retrieves a list of IPAM resource discovery instances.

ListIpamResourceDiscoveryAssociations.title: ListIpamResourceDiscoveryAssociations
ListIpamResourceDiscoveryAssociations.summary: Lists the associations between resource discoveries and IP Address Managers (IPAMs).

ListIpamScopes.title: ListIpamScopes
ListIpamScopes.summary: Queries the details of IPAM scopes.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are associated with resources.

OpenVpcIpamService.title: OpenVpcIpamService
OpenVpcIpamService.summary: Activates the IP Address Management (IPAM) service.

RemoveIpamMembers.title: RemoveIpamMembers
RemoveIpamMembers.summary: Removes members from the IPAM trusted service.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Adds a tag to a resource.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes a tag from a resource.

UpdateIpam.title: UpdateIpam
UpdateIpam.summary: Modifies an IP Address Management (IPAM) instance.

UpdateIpamPool.title: UpdateIpamPool
UpdateIpamPool.summary: Updates the basic information of an IPAM pool.

UpdateIpamPoolAllocation.title: UpdateIpamPoolAllocation
UpdateIpamPoolAllocation.summary: Updates a CIDR allocation from an IPAM address pool.

UpdateIpamScope.title: UpdateIpamScope
UpdateIpamScope.summary: Updates the basic information of an IPAM scope.
